## Research Interests

- Methods for prioritizing interventions in chronic disease and preventive services
- Lack of precision in clinical measurement and its impact on clinical practice
- Quality improvement in care for diabetes and other common chronic diseases
- Quality measurement and monitoring in the complex patient

## Methodology Interests

- Research design, cluster randomized trials, quasi-experimental methods
- Multilevel modeling applications in health service research
- Measurement theory
- Clinical risk adjustment
